description: Student & Coaching School Plan System Implementation
releaseNotes: Complete implementation of Student and Coaching School plan types with dynamic plan configuration system. Key features: (1) Added new Student plan (60min monthly, 50MB files, $9.99/month) and Coaching School plan (unlimited usage, 200MB files, $299/month) to serve educational institutions; (2) Implemented comprehensive plan configuration service with database-driven plan management, real-time validation, and usage analytics; (3) Enhanced frontend with dynamic plan-based file size limits, improved billing modal, and seamless plan switching; (4) Updated all dashboard components with plan-aware features and refined i18n translations for better user experience; (5) Added database migrations, management scripts, and emergency tools for production support; (6) Integrated plan validation throughout the entire system from file upload to session processing. The system now supports flexible plan configurations that can be updated without code changes.
author: Coachly Team
